org.tms.api.io

Interface PageableIOOption<T extends PageableIOOption<T>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DOCOptions, org.tms.io.options.FormattedPageIOOptions, PDFOptions, RTFOptions

    public interface PageableIOOption<T extends PageableIOOption<T>>
    An IOOption where the output can be paged. Paging elements that are supported include:
    • page width,
    • page height,
    • page numbers,
    • paging,
    • sticky row labels,
    • sticky columns labels, and

    Note: PageableIOOption methods only affect export operations.

    Since:
    "1.1"
    Version:
    "1.1"

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getPageHeight()
      Returns the page height, in inches, of the output page.
      int getPageWidth()
      Returns the page width, in inches, of the output page.
      boolean isPaged()
      Returns true if output is to be divided into discrete pages, optionally with page numbers, headers, and footers.
      boolean isPageNumbers()
      Returns true if paging is enabled and page numbers are to be printed on each page.
      boolean isStickyColumnLabels()
      Returns true if Column labels are to be repeated at the top of every export page.
      boolean isStickyRowLabels()
      Returns true if Row labels are to be repeated on subsequent pages when Column output spans a single page.
      T withPageHeightInInches(double height)
      Set the page height, in inches, in the generated export output.
      T withPageHeightInPx(int height)
      Set the page height, in pixels, in the generated export output.
      T withPageNumbers()
      Enable the generation of page numbers in the page footer in the export output.
      T withPageNumbers(boolean enabled)
      Enable or disable page numbers in the footer section of generated export output.
      T withPages()
      Enable paged output in exports.
      T withPages(boolean enabled)
      Enable or disable paged output in exports.
      T withPageWidthInInches(double width)
      Set the page width, in inches, in the generated export output.
      T withPageWidthInPx(int width)
      Set the page width, in pixels, in the generated export output.
      T withStickyColumnLabels()
      Enables sticky Column labels.
      T withStickyColumnLabels(boolean sticky)
      Enables or disables sticky Column labels.
      T withStickyRowLabels()
      Enables sticky Row labels.
      T withStickyRowLabels(boolean sticky)
      Enables or disables sticky Row labels.

    • Method Detail

      • isPaged

        boolean isPaged()
        Returns true if output is to be divided into discrete pages, optionally with page numbers, headers, and footers. Returns false if output paging has not been enabled.
        Returns:
        true if output paging is enabled

      • withPages

        T withPages()
        Enable paged output in exports. Table data is output in discrete pages, optionally, with column headings repeated on the top of each page, and page numbers and the date-time that the export was performed output on the bottom of each page.
        Returns:
        a new T with output paging enabled
        See Also:
        withDateTimeFormat, withPageNumbers, withStickyColumnLabels

      • withPages

        T withPages(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable paged output in exports. When true, Table data is output in discrete pages, optionally, with column headings repeated on the top of each page, and page numbers and the date-time that the export was performed output on the bottom of each page. When false, the output is not paged.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable paging, false to disable paging
        Returns:
        a new T with output paging enabled or disabled
        See Also:
        withDateTimeFormat, withPageNumbers, withStickyColumnLabels

      • isPageNumbers

        boolean isPageNumbers()
        Returns true if paging is enabled and page numbers are to be printed on each page.
        Returns:
        true if page numbers are to be printed

      • withPageNumbers

        T withPageNumbers()
        Enable the generation of page numbers in the page footer in the export output.
        Returns:
        a new T with page numbers enabled

      • withPageNumbers

        T withPageNumbers(boolean enabled)
        Enable or disable page numbers in the footer section of generated export output.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable page numbers, false to disable
        Returns:
        a new T with page numbers enabled or disabled

      • getPageWidth

        int getPageWidth()
        Returns the page width, in inches, of the output page.
        Returns:
        the page width, in inches, of the output page

      • withPageWidthInInches

        T withPageWidthInInches(double width)
        Set the page width, in inches, in the generated export output.
        Parameters:
        width - the new page width of the export output, in inches
        Returns:
        a new T with the specified page width, in inches

      • withPageWidthInPx

        T withPageWidthInPx(int width)
        Set the page width, in pixels, in the generated export output.
        Parameters:
        width - the new page width of the export output, in pixels
        Returns:
        a new T with the specified page width, in pixels

      • getPageHeight

        int getPageHeight()
        Returns the page height, in inches, of the output page.
        Returns:
        the page height, in inches, of the output page

      • withPageHeightInInches

        T withPageHeightInInches(double height)
        Set the page height, in inches, in the generated export output.
        Parameters:
        height - the new page height of the export output, in inches
        Returns:
        a new T with the specified page height, in inches

      • withPageHeightInPx

        T withPageHeightInPx(int height)
        Set the page height, in pixels, in the generated export output.
        Parameters:
        height - the new page height of the export output, in pixels
        Returns:
        a new T with the specified page height, in pixels

      • isStickyRowLabels

        boolean isStickyRowLabels()
        Returns true if Row labels are to be repeated on subsequent pages when Column output spans a single page.
        Returns:
        true if row labels are to be repeated on subsequent pages

      • withStickyRowLabels

        T withStickyRowLabels()
        Enables sticky Row labels. This causes Row labels to reprint on subsequent export output pages when column data spans more than one page.
        Returns:
        a new T with sticky row labels enabled

      • withStickyRowLabels

        T withStickyRowLabels(boolean sticky)
        Enables or disables sticky Row labels. When enabled, Row labels are reprinted on subsequent export output pages when column data spans more than one page.
        Parameters:
        sticky - true to enable sticky row labels, false to disable
        Returns:
        a new T with sticky row labels enabled or disabled

      • isStickyColumnLabels

        boolean isStickyColumnLabels()
        Returns true if Column labels are to be repeated at the top of every export page.
        Returns:
        true if column labels are to be reprinted at the top of every export page

      • withStickyColumnLabels

        T withStickyColumnLabels()
        Enables sticky Column labels. This causes Column labels are reprinted at the top of subsequent export output pages when there are more rows in the exported Table than can fit on a single page.
        Returns:
        a new T with sticky column labels enabled

      • withStickyColumnLabels

        T withStickyColumnLabels(boolean sticky)
        Enables or disables sticky Column labels. When enabled, Column labels are reprinted at the top of subsequent export output pages when there are more rows in the exported Table than can fit on a single page.
        Parameters:
        sticky - true to enable sticky column labels, false to disable
        Returns:
        a new T with sticky column labels enabled or disabled
